definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: As they raised him, a ring tinkled down and rolled across the floor.
sentences.chinese: 當他們擡起死屍時，有一隻戒指滾落在地板上了。

sentences.english: Suddenly a cantaloupe-size rock tumbled from the truck's load.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一塊甜瓜大小的石頭從負載的卡車上滾落下來。

sentences.english: Top racers release the pressure coming out of the fall-line.
sentences.chinese: 頂級選手在滑經滾落線的之後就開始釋放雪板的壓力。

sentences.english: The fall line is the straightest way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 滾落線指的是從山上滑下的最筆直的路線。

sentences.english: The napalm rolled over and down the front of the recessed embrasure.
sentences.chinese: 那一發凝固汽油彈滾落到了嵌壁槍眼的前方。

sentences.english: Tons of wet earth and big rocks began moving down the sides of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 成噸成噸的溼土和大岩石開始從山坡兩側滾落下來。

sentences.english: The ball bounces across the ground and rolls up to my feet.
sentences.chinese: 球在地上蹦蹦跳跳着，最後滾落到我的腳下。

sentences.english: Her ball of yarn rolled from her lap. she let it go .
sentences.chinese: 毛線團從她的膝上滾落，她也沒有去管它。

sentences.english: Tears rolled down her face, wetting the lenses.
sentences.chinese: 淚珠從她的臉上滾落，濡溼了鏡片。

sentences.english: Pull up the corners of shaking slightly, with smiles hide the tears rolling.
sentences.chinese: 微微扯起顫抖的嘴角，用微笑去掩飾滾落的淚水。

sentences.english: Ruth heard gravel rolling around where Judy was climbing.
sentences.chinese: 魯斯聽見了朱迪爬行的地方石子滾落的聲音。

sentences.english: Like beads of liquid mercury rolling about.
sentences.chinese: 頻繁地眨動，像滾落在地上的水銀珠。

sentences.english: Tons of wet earth big rocks began moving down the sides of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 成噸成噸的溼土和大岩石開始從山坡兩側滾落下來。

sentences.english: Shane slammed into a tree and rolled off the sled.
sentences.chinese: 沙恩砰的一聲撞上一棵樹，從雪橇上滾落下來。

sentences.english: It 5)tumbled off the shovel of their front-loader.
sentences.chinese: 當時，這個銅像從挖土機的剷鬥中滾落了下來。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
